name: Zombie Arena (ch4run)
description:
Hello Visitor!

Give a try to this verylowpoly amateur topdown-shooter prototype. I made this 2~3 years ago, while getting familiar with Unity engine and C# language. The environment assets were made in Blender, or some of them are just Unity basic 3d primitives. Maybe this project worths getting some publicity just for fun.

You can shoot enemies, collect ammo and health packages, and can be eaten by zombies or fall in the hot lava. By the way the game has also a story, and a very basic gameflow design about exploring, shooting enemies and solvig puzzles, but these features aren't implemented at all. Now all is about just killing zombies on a single map.

There are no sounds and music in the project, although I've already written the main and the high score scene themes in my head.

Default controls are: WASD + mouse + LMB/RMB.
Tested only on PC, Windows 10. Doesn't need to install, just unzip and start.

If you like it, and you can imagine for example a story mode in this feeling, or have some kind of suggestions, let me know! If you are hungry enough for braaainz, maybe I dig out again this forgotten project, and make it great... :D

Oh, and can you find the corrupt, mad scientist.. ?

Metal!
